languages.text: "Конечно, это правда. Я — арбитр во втором поколении, и мой отец мертвее некуда. Начинаю подозревать, что смерть при исполнении — это у нас потомственное, надо только предварительно обзавестись ребенком". {n}Если это и была шутка, на лице Соломона и мускул не дрогнул.{/n}

"It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

"It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

languages.text: 「全部本当の話です。私は二代目のアービトレイターで、父はとっくに亡くなっています。戦死するのが、私の家系の伝統なのかもしれません。せめて自分の子どもができるまでは死ぬのを我慢すべきなのでしょう」{n}ソロモーンの表情は一切動かず、冗談なのかどうか判別がつかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全部本当の話です。私は二代目のアービトレイターで、父はとっくに亡くなっています。戦死するのが、私の家系の伝統なのかもしれません。せめて自分の子どもができるまでは死ぬのを我慢すべきなのでしょう」{n}ソロモーンの表情は一切動かず、冗談なのかどうか判別がつかない。{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist alles wahr. Ich bin Arbitrator in zweiter Generation, und mein Vater ist so tot, wie man nur sein kann. Ich frage mich, ob es in der Familie liegt, im Einsatz getötet zu werden. Ich sollte mich wohl zurückhalten, bis ich ein Kind habe." {n}In Solomornes Gesicht zuckt kein Muskel, du kannst nicht sagen, ob er gerade einen Witz gemacht hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist alles wahr. Ich bin Arbitrator in zweiter Generation, und mein Vater ist so tot, wie man nur sein kann. Ich frage mich, ob es in der Familie liegt, im Einsatz getötet zu werden. Ich sollte mich wohl zurückhalten, bis ich ein Kind habe." {n}In Solomornes Gesicht zuckt kein Muskel, du kannst nicht sagen, ob er gerade einen Witz gemacht hat.{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous dis la vérité. Je suis arbitrator et fils d'arbitrator. Et mon père est bel et bien mort. Je me demande si comme lui, je suis destiné à mourir dans le cadre de mes fonctions. Il faudrait peut-être que je me hâte de devenir père. » {n}Le visage de Solomorne reste parfaitement impassible et vous ne parvenez pas à deviner s'il s'agissait d'un trait d'humour.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous dis la vérité. Je suis arbitrator et fils d'arbitrator. Et mon père est bel et bien mort. Je me demande si comme lui, je suis destiné à mourir dans le cadre de mes fonctions. Il faudrait peut-être que je me hâte de devenir père. » {n}Le visage de Solomorne reste parfaitement impassible et vous ne parvenez pas à deviner s'il s'agissait d'un trait d'humour.{/n}

languages.text: «Es todo verdad. Soy un Arbitrator de segunda generación, y mi padre está criando malvas. Me pregunto si vendrá de familia morir en cumplimiento del deber. Tendría que contenerme hasta ser padre, por si acaso». {n}Ni un solo músculo se contrae en la cara de Solomorne, por lo que te resulta imposible saber si bromea.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

Tendría que contenerme hasta ser padre, por si acaso». {n}Ni un solo músculo se contrae en la cara de Solomorne, por lo que te resulta imposible saber si bromea.{/n}

languages.text: “都是真的，我是我们家族第二代法务官，而我的父亲已经死了。不知道殉职这件事情会不会遗传，或许我应该等我自己有了孩子再说。”{n}索罗蒙的脸上没有一丝抽搐，让人无法辨别他是不是在开玩笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “都是真的，我是我们家族第二代法务官，而我的父亲已经死了。不知道殉职这件事情会不会遗传，或许我应该等我自己有了孩子再说。”{n}索罗蒙的脸上没有一丝抽搐，让人无法辨别他是不是在开玩笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Hepsi gerçek. Ben ikinci nesil bir Yargıcı'yım ve babam da daha ölü olamazdı. Görev başında öldürülmek bizim ailenin bir geleneği mi acaba? Çocuğum olsun da anlarız." {n}Solomorne'un yüzünde tek bir kas bile oynamıyor, şaka yapıp yapmadığını anlamak imkânsız.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's all true. I am a second-generation Arbitrator, and my father is as dead as it gets. I wonder if being killed in action runs in the family. I guess I should hold off until I have a kid." {n}Not a muscle twitches in Solomorne's face, making it impossible to tell if he is joking.{/n}
